special_text:
[i]Ashen[/i] – Clairvoyant Arli enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter for each {C} spent to cast it.
[+2]: Draw two cards.
[-2]: Return up to one target permanent and up to one target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard to their owners' hands.
[-9]: Take an extra turn after this one. During that turn, you may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
